name: Zlash
description:
ZLash

By: Simplemaker17

Welcome to my first project.

Short plot:

You play as a slasher who join an arena to kill zombies for money.

Explain.

This game is pretty simple for now. You just survive yourself from hungry zombies and you can kill them with your weapon. More score you get, those zombies are harder to kill. You can take some ammo around the arena.

You can see how many time you play, how many zombies you kill, and other on menu.

This game is not good?

It's just begun for creating it. If more people are interesting to play it, I will developing it until finish this full version.
